front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Conformance Test Procedures for Service Interoperability in Ethernet Passive Optical Networks, IEEE Std 1904.1, Package C

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard specifies a suite of conformance tests for system-level requirements of Ethernet Passive Optical Network (EPON) equipment, defined in IEEE Std 1904.1, Package C.
